snippet.title: Fall Balance Ball − Chapter two − New game mode
snippet.description:
In the update: new mechanics and obstacles, lasers, enemies, buttons trigger mechanisms, disappearing and rotating platforms. The level design has become more complex to reach the final you need to investigate levels.

Fall Balance Ball on steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1496470/Fall_Balance_Ball/
